column2: The Lovesac Co. is a technology driven, omni-channel company. The company is headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut and currently employs 257 full-time employees. The firm markets its modular couches under the name, Sactionals and its bean bags under the name, Sacs. The Sactionals are couch systems that consists of seats and sides. The firm has 66 showrooms in the United States. The company also sells its products in malls and through online sites. The firm provides its products in a range of colors and fabrics and customizes the products in configuration and styles. The company also offers accessories that include drink holders, footsac blankets, decorative pillows, fitted seat tables, and ottomans.
